Description:
Notice ESS/CJC/100322/01 / 312362847 - IN served - You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely welding fume, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Notice ESS/CJC/100322/02 / 312362947 - IN served -  You have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to substances hazardous to health, namely Thomas Howse T7003 (T3) thinners, is either prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled.

Notice ESS/CJC/100322/03 / 312362958 - You have failed to prevent access to the dangerous parts of your Herbert and Draper drills thereby placing employees at risk of entanglement in the rotating parts.
